face detector.from sentence: In this report , we develop a face detector on the top of R - FCN with elaborate design of the details , which achieves more decent performance than the R - CNN face detectors .

design.from sentence: According to the size of the general face , we carefully design size of anchors and RoIs .

eliminate.from sentence: Since the contribution of facial parts maybe different for detection , we introduce a position - sensitive average pooling to generate embedding features for enhancing discrimination , and eliminate the effect of non-uniformed contribution in each facial part .

apply.from sentence: Furthermore , we also apply the multi-scale training and testing strategy in this work .

on - line hard example mining ( OHEM ) t.from sentence: The on - line hard example mining ( OHEM ) technique is integrated into our network as well for boosting the learning on hard examples .
